content: nepal mitts are simple and enough quick to knit project it was designed as one size but thanks to broken rib stitch mitts are enough stretchy and could fit larger hands you can knit them one by one or two-at-a-time using magic loop method knitted using drops nepal yarn but you can use any aran/worsted yarn of your choice skill level intermediate skills knit purl 1 stitch left/right leaning cable size one size adult **2017-01-23** pdf update includes minor pattern corrections
